hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ARCH_MAP
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.defaultValue: d03 arm64 d02 arm64 d01 arm32

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
function build_image_for_sata() { image_des_dir=$1 cd kernel defconfig_file=arch/arm64/configs/defconfig dts_file=arch/arm64/boot/dts/hisilicon/hip05-d02.dts if [ -f ${defconfig_file}_bk ]; then rm -fr ${defconfig_file}_bk mv ${defconfig_file}_bk ${defconfig_file} fi if [ -f ${dts_file}_bk ]; then rm -fr ${dts_file} mv ${dts_file}_bk ${dts_file} fi cp ${defconfig_file} ${defconfig_file}_bk cp ${dts_file} ${dts_file}_bk sed -i 's/CONFIG_SATA_MV=m/CONFIG_SATA_MV=y/g' ${defconfig_file} SATA_BOOT="rdinit=/init root=/dev/sda2 rootdelay=10 rootfstype=ext4 rw console=ttyS0,115200 earlycon=uart8250,mmio32,0x80300000 ip=dhcp" SAS_BOOT="earlycon=uart8250,mmio32,0x80300000 console=ttyS0,115200 initrd=0x7000000,350M" sed -i "s#$SAS_BOOT#$SATA_BOOT#g" ${dts_file} export ARCH=arm64 echo $PATH export CROSS_COMPILE=${WORKSPACE}/opt/gcc-linaro-4.9-2015.02-3-x86_64_aarch64-linux-gnu/bin/aarch64-linux-gnu- make defconfig make -j $CPU_NUM cp ./arch/arm64/boot/Image ../${image_des_dir} cp ./arch/arm64/boot/dts/hisilicon/hip05-d02.dtb ../${image_des_dir} make clean rm -fr ${dts_file} && mv ${dts_file}_bk ${dts_file} rm -fr ${defconfig_file} && mv ${defconfig_file}_bk ${defconfig_file} cd .. }
set -x
timefile="timestamp.log" if [ -f $timefile ]; then rm -fr $timefile else touch $timefile fi
echo "the begin time is "${BUILD_TIMESTAMP_PATH} >> $timefile
CPU_NUM=$(cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep processor | wc -l)
export
cd ${WORKSPACE}
if [ ! -e bin ]; then mkdir -p bin; wget -c http://www.open-estuary.com/EstuaryDownloads/tools/repo -O bin/repo chmod a+x bin/repo; fi
# get the newest content of git repos export PATH=${WORKSPACE}/bin:$PATH; open_estuary_dir=local/open-estuary if [ ! -e $open_estuary_dir ]; then mkdir -p $open_estuary_dir; fi if [ -e $open_estuary_dir ]; then cd $open_estuary_dir; repo abandon master repo forall -c git reset --hard if [ "$VERSION"x != ""x ]; then repo init -u "https://github.com/open-estuary/estuary.git" -b refs/tags/$VERSION --no-repo-verify --repo-url=git://android.git.linaro.org/tools/repo else repo init -u "https://github.com/open-estuary/estuary.git" -b master --no-repo-verify --repo-url=git://android.git.linaro.org/tools/repo fi false; while [ $? -ne 0 ]; do repo sync; done repo start master --all cd ../.. fi
echo "the end time of finishing downloading estuary is "${BUILD_TIMESTAMP_PATH} >> $timefile
cd ${WORKSPACE}
cd $open_estuary_dir
############## get the GIT_DESCRIBE ###################### if [ "$VERSION"x = ""x ]; then #### get uefi commit pushd uefi UEFI_GIT_DESCRIBE='uefi_'$(git log --oneline | head -1 | awk '{print $1}') popd #### get kernel commit pushd kernel KERNEL_GIT_DESCRIBE='kernel_'$(git log --oneline | head -1 | awk '{print $1}') popd #### get grub commit pushd grub GURB_GIT_DESCRIBE='grub_'$(git log --oneline | head -1 | awk '{print $1}') popd
GIT_DESCRIBE=$UEFI_GIT_DESCRIBE"_"$GURB_GIT_DESCRIBE"_"$KERNEL_GIT_DESCRIBE else GIT_DESCRIBE=$VERSION fi
if [ -d $GIT_DESCRIBE ]; then sudo rm -fr $GIT_DESCRIBE fi mkdir $GIT_DESCRIBE ############## END of GIT_DESCRIBE ######################
echo $SHELL_DISTRO
read -a arch <<< $(echo $ARCH_MAP) declare -A dict for((i=0; i<${#arch[@]}; i++)) do if ((i%2==0)); then j=`expr $i+1` dict[${arch[$i]}]=${arch[$j]} fi done
set -x for PLATFORM in $SHELL_PLATFORM do PLATFORM_1="$(echo $PLATFORM | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" echo ${dict[$PLATFORM_1]} DES_DISTRO=$GIT_DESCRIBE/${PLATFORM_1}-${dict[$PLATFORM_1]} [ -d $DES_DISTRO ] && rm -fr $DES_DISTRO mkdir -p $DES_DISTRO for DISTRO in $SHELL_DISTRO do echo $PLATFORM echo $DISTRO current_path=$PWD cd ../estuary_test/boot-app-scripts plat_distros=`python parameter_parser.py -f config.yaml -s DISTRO -k $PLATFORM` distro_whole_name=`python parameter_parser.py -f config.yaml -s DISTRO -k $PLATFORM -v $DISTRO` cd $current_path [[ ${plat_distros/$DISTRO//} == $plat_distros ]] && continue ./estuary/build.sh -p $PLATFORM -d $DISTRO if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then exit -1 fi
# delete the link file in the build/$PLATFORM delete_file=$(ls -l ./build/$PLATFORM/binary | grep "\->" | awk '{print $9}') echo $delete_file
declare -a del_arr read -a del_arr <<< $(echo $delete_file)
for j in ${del_arr[@]} do sudo rm -fr ./build/$PLATFORM/binary/$j done
if [ x"$PLATFORM" = x"D02" ]; then sata_image_dir=sata_image [ -d $sata_image_dir ] && rm -fr $sata_image_dir mkdir $sata_image_dir build_image_for_sata $sata_image_dir if [ "`ls -A $sata_image_dir`" = "" ]; then echo "xompiling the sata booting image error" exit -1 else [ -d build/$PLATFORM/binary/$sata_image_dir ] && rm -fr build/$PLATFORM/binary/$sata_image_dir mv $sata_image_dir build/$PLATFORM/binary fi fi
# move the build file to the $GIT_DESCRIBE file ls -l build if [ ! -d $DES_DISTRO/binary ]; then #sudo mv build/$PLATFORM/binary $GIT_DESCRIBE sudo cp -r build/$PLATFORM/binary $DES_DISTRO fi if [ ! -d $DES_DISTRO/toolchain ]; then #sudo mv build/$PLATFORM/toolchain $GIT_DESCRIBE sudo cp -r build/$PLATFORM/toolchain $DES_DISTRO fi if [ ! -d $DES_DISTRO/distro ]; then sudo mkdir $DES_DISTRO/distro fi sudo cp distro/${distro_whole_name}* $DES_DISTRO/distro echo "the end time of building $DISTRO is ${BUILD_TIMESTAMP_PATH} " >> $timefile done
DES_DIR=$FTP_DIR/$TREE_NAME/$GIT_DESCRIBE/ [ ! -d $DES_DIR ] && sudo mkdir -p $DES_DIR sudo cp -rf $GIT_DESCRIBE/* $DES_DIR [ $? -ne 0 ]&& exit -1 ls -l $GIT_DESCRIBE sudo rm -fr $GIT_DESCRIBE echo "the end time of building for $PLATFORM is ${BUILD_TIMESTAMP_PATH} " >> $timefile done
sudo cp -rf $timefile $DES_DIR #sudo rm -fr build
# push the binary files to the ftpserver #sudo python ../estuary_test/boot-app-scripts/publish.py -j open-estuary -p $PLATFORM -d ./$GIT_DESCRIBE
echo $GIT_DESCRIBE cat << EOF > ${WORKSPACE}/env.properties GIT_DESCRIBE=$GIT_DESCRIBE SHELL_PLATFORM=$SHELL_PLATFORM SHELL_DISTRO=$SHELL_DISTRO BOOT_PLAN=$BOOT_PLAN APP_PLAN=$APP_PLAN USER=$USER HOST=$HOST LAVA_SERVER=$LAVA_SERVER LAVA_USER=$LAVA_USER LAVA_STREAM=$LAVA_STREAM LAVA_TOKEN=$LAVA_TOKEN KERNELCI_SERVER=$KERNELCI_SERVER KERNELCI_TOKEN=$KERNELCI_TOKEN FTP_SERVER=$FTP_SERVER ARCH_MAP=$ARCH_MAP TFTP_DIR=$TFTP_DIR EOF
cat ${WORKSPACE}/env.properties
cd ../..
